title: Summer Wishes
description: The follow-up novella to the dystopian romance, DESIRE, which can also be a stand alone novella. Upon their upcoming 18th birthday, Kama's friends Jocelyn and Matthew gets a surprise visit from someone Jocelyn did not believe she would ever see again... her banished older brother. What starts out as a sweet visit ends in the most shocking revelation.
author: Kailin Gow
